channel.title: Project Locsta || LOGIN&PK ~ SPAWN SERVER ~ PK/ECO ~ FRIENDLY COMMUNITY
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KibBzsL.gif[/img]
[b]Intro[/b]: [u] Locsta is a 474 based server. This server's main focus is to give players what THEY want. Unlike other hosters who only want to take your money, Locsta gives players the opportunity to let them, in other words, run the server. Locsta's development team updates the server based on a players' suggestion. Here at Locsta, we take into consideration what you want in the game, and what you don't want. The staff of Locsta is always active, let's not forget friendly. [/u].
[b]Client[/b]: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta.jar
[b]Features[/b]:
Bosses Minigames Perfect Combat Perfect Switching for hybrids All 07rs items Clipped Following DDOS Protected VPS XP Counter HP/PRAY/RUN Orbs Minimap works Compass on the minimap works(Click here to face North) Donation System PK Point System with Killstreaks Vote System No dupes exploited (yet) 24/7 Uptime Constant Updates Changing display names ( Just like real RuneScape, log in with original user ) AFK System ( Character starts to exercise after 1minute & 30seconds without activity ) All Skills work
[b]Media:[/b]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/rsek39.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mnRBj7y.png[/img]
[b]Added PKP shop[/b]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/29djuqa.png[/img]
[b]New Bandos/Zuriels[/b]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/24bkfib.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2d9wznk.png[/img]
[b]Runescape 2007 Items[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vv2KmS2.png[/img]
[b]RuneScape 2007 NPC[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/McXAlZ1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XG9crNI.png[/img]
[b]Clean Equipment Tab[/b]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2qb9o43.png[/img]
[b]Updated Quest Tab ( all buttons work )[/b]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/33tqk9u.png[/img]
[b]Proper Bones on Altar[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y4ycxEA.gif[/img]
[b]Teleports[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3UqJ2PX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4GLSj6n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5H8Jo0z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ihzl2rF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xSbK2Dr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QPtR7b4.png[/img]
[b]Fully working Redemption Prayer[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bvFJZwb.gif[/img]
[b]Name Displaying ( Saves upon disconnection )[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ffsPzqT.gif[/img]
[b]AFK System (Players away for 1min30seconds)[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KjhbAut.gif[/img]
[b]Flax Picking[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JOdPmAc.gif[/img]
[b]Abysstal Tentacle Poisoning[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4tdOsIV.gif[/img]
[b]Improved Switching[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/57MeJoA.gif[/img]

Intro:
Locsta is a 474 based server. This server’s main focus is to give players what THEY want.
Unlike other hosters who only want to take your money, Locsta gives players the opportunity to let them, in other words, run the server.
Locsta’s development team updates the server based on a players’ suggestion.
Here at Locsta, we take into consideration what you want in the game, and what you don’t want.
The staff of Locsta is always active, let’s not forget friendly.
